verbs.description: unlime (third-person singular simple present unlimes, present participle unliming, simple past and past participle unlimed)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To remove the lime from (hides) as part of the tanning process.
examples: The process of unliming hides and skins in tanning has been a slow and disgusting one, consisting in soaking the skins in a bath of manure in water, called bate.
